attributes.action: Rona Fairhead is an unsuitable person to be the BBC TRUST CHAIRMAN and the Secretary of State for Culture Media & Sport should ask her resignation.
attributes.additional_details:
Following her incompetence at being involved with the fiasco at HSCB she is unfit to have such a responsible role at  the BBC.
As I licence payer I feel that she should either resign or be removed from the post.
